name: KILL KILL KILL
description:
KILL KILL KILL is an arcade-styled shooter, where you have to survive for as long as possible.

The more you kill, the better. Use their corpses to unlock more levels, travel around the world and kill lots of different enemies!

Features:

- Arcade-style first person shooter

- Pixel art graphics style

- Lots of unlockable levels, with one final SECRET level

- 20+ different enemies

Well, what are you waiting for? This game is completely free!

Download KILL KILL KILL NOW, and SLAY YOUR ENEMIES!!!!
